articles.title: Microsoft Surface Pro 7 Plus launched with removable SSD, 11th Gen Intel CPUs - The Indian Express
articles.description: The new Surface Pro 7+ will also feature Intel’s latest 11th Generation Core processors, which Microsoft says will help increase battery life and performance.
articles.content: Out of nowhere, Microsoft on Monday introduced a new Surface Pro 2-in-1 tablet with a removable SSD and 4G LTE. The new Surface Pro 7 Plus is only available to businesses and schools, Microsoft says.… [+1746 chars]

articles.title: Google Stadia on LG TVs is a glimpse at Xbox Game Pass' inevitable future - Windows Central
articles.description: Like music, movies, and television before it, video games are heading to our smart TVs via apps, eliminating the need for a video game console entirely.

articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.title: We gave this laptop a 7, then a Swedish metal band turned it up to 11 - The Verge
articles.description: An advertising agency representing Lenovo commissioned a Swedish metal band to perform a few key lines from a Verge review of the Lenovo Legion 5i gaming laptop. It’s as weird and delightful as it sounds.
articles.content:
Filed under:
Lenovo took our review and ran with it
